name: Harlan Designs Amaze & Ablaze
description:
Take control of a maze across six unique levels in an attempt to get your ball to the end. Avoid unique traps that can both help and hinder your progress, collect hearts to unlock unique skins, no real money involved.....

Go head to head with a friend in love and hate mode on two unique maps in a race to victory.

6 single player maps
2 multiplayer maps
7 unique skins

A different approach to a puzzle game with a little bit of synth wave to roll around to.

Controls

Single player

WASD / Left thumb stick – movement
Space bar / Down face button – world camera
ESC/P / Up face button – pause menu

Multiplayer

Red – W & S can only control up and down
Blue – left thumb stick can only control left and right

Team

Alan Horton - Game & level design
Lee Stockton - Generalist / level desgin
Robyn Murphy - Artist
Cat Wiltshire - Artist
Laura Flinders - Artist
